https://tmrev.io/movie/39693-Echoes of the Rainbow 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/aioItM3DLqqaAXIzP4QrfxoPeFS.jpg Told through the eyes of sticky-fingered eight-year-old boy Big Ears, Echoes of the Rainbow takes place in a close-knit grassroots community in 1960s Hong Kong. Big Ears' mother and father run the neighborhood shoe store, and his older brother Desmond is every family's dream son - an outstanding athlete with grades worthy of Hong Kong's best school. Echoes of the Rainbow
